TopicTitle: KPS-1 Interplanetary Ballistic Missile (Need a way to get it into orbit!)

Articles.Content:
Welcome, and see the new giant superproject of the Medwedian Military:

The KPS-1

KPS - Kerbin Protection System

The KPS-1 is an Interplanetary Ballistic Missile Launcher that needs currently to get into Orbit. Your Launch System Ideas are welcome.

Type: Interplanetary Ballistic Missile Orbital Launcher

Mods Used: Silisko Edition, NovaPunch (SundayPunch), Radial Boosters, AR202, RinComp, MechJeb

(Please post comment if you will find more mods)

Country: Medwedia

Description: In the 1980\'s, Medwedia has builded a lot of new ICBM\'s. But in the year 1992, the Engineers have builded this.

It has currently no way to launch it and explodes on the Pad, so please post your ideas here.

I belive that allthe weight smushes the bottom parts and cause it to explode. It would also topple over do to the base not being large enough. You will need a large plate kinda object and some struts to make a satellite dish thing to put on the bottom.

yeah the bottom gets crushed every time try using a 3m to 1m adapter for that it would probably be better to use a 3m to 2m adapter to make it more stable. if it is 2m already then use a 2m to 3m adapter that should work fine but you have to use the right parts
I have voted myself for i do not know...
Why does it have \'life modules\' in the middle of one of the fuel tanks? Kind of ironic...
